title: Chivalry is Dead
description: "Ladies First." So say the gentlemen. This is the companion anthology to Hell Hath No Fury... Inside, you will find an undead baker's dozen that will remind you of how dark and desolate the minds of men can truly be. Vowing not to be upstaged by the dark musings of their female cohorts, the men offer up a visceral, gore-drenched collection that strives to prove...Chivalry Is Dead!
author: T.W. Brown
